# Royal Mix Global – 90 Day Empire Roadmap

## Phase 1 (Day 1–30): Foundation & Stability
- [ ] Finalize core architecture (AI, discovery, recommendation)
- [ ] Stabilize agent registration & reporting
- [ ] Media upload + playback (video, text, images)
- [ ] Offline-first & low-bandwidth optimization
- [ ] Pi Browser compatibility validation

## Phase 2 (Day 31–60): Growth & Monetization
- [ ] Creator monetization (ads, sponsorships)
- [ ] Agent commission automation
- [ ] Marketplace & services activation
- [ ] Government & NGO dashboard MVP
- [ ] Search (text + voice + video)

## Phase 3 (Day 61–90): Empire Expansion
- [ ] Pi Network pioneer onboarding
- [ ] Employment engine activation
- [ ] Crisis response module
- [ ] AI recommendation personalization
- [ ] Regional rollout (Zambia → Africa)

## Success Metrics
- Agents active daily
- Content indexed & discovered
- Transactions processed
- Governments/NGOs onboarded
- System uptime & trust score
